channel.title: pango on gobbi
channel.description: Recent content in pango on gobbi

item.title: constants
item.description: ANALYSIS_FLAG_CENTERED_BASELINE Whether the segment should be shifted to center around the baseline. Used in vertical writing directions mostly. PANGO_ANALYSIS_FLAG_CENTERED_BASELINE ANALYSIS_FLAG_IS_ELLIPSIS This flag is used to mark runs that hold ellipsized text, in an ellipsized layout. PANGO_ANALYSIS_FLAG_IS_ELLIPSIS ATTR_INDEX_FROM_TEXT_BEGINNING This value can be used to set the start_index member of a #PangoAttribute such that the attribute covers from the beginning of the text. PANGO_ATTR_INDEX_FROM_TEXT_BEGINNING ENGINE_TYPE_LANG A string constant defining the engine type for language engines.
